statements: DELETE FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_plan = 'Physical Therapy';
DELETE FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_plan = 'Chemotherapy' AND patient_id = 2;

DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND data_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND temperature > 100.0;
DELETE FROM treatment_plan WHERE scheduled_date < '2022-01-01' AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND value > 100
DELETE FROM DiagnosisRecord WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith' AND date <= '2022-01-31'
